edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal

Class CmtElGamalReceiverCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalReceiverCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmtReceiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CmtElGamalHashReceiver, CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver, CmtElGamalOnGroupElementReceiver

    public abstract class CmtElGamalReceiverCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmtReceiver
    This abstract class performs all the core functionality of the receiver side of ElGamal commitment. Specific implementations can extend this class and add or override functions as necessary.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CmtElGamalReceiverCore(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, ElGamalEnc elGamal)
      Constructor that receives a connected channel (to the receiver), the DlogGroup agreed upon between them and the encryption object.

      • CmtElGamalReceiverCore

        public CmtElGamalReceiverCore(Channel channel,
                              DlogGroup dlog,
                              ElGamalEnc elGamal)
                       throws SecurityLevelException,
                              InvalidDlogGroupException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              CheatAttemptException
        Constructor that receives a connected channel (to the receiver), the DlogGroup agreed upon between them and the encryption object. The committer needs to be instantiated with the same DlogGroup, otherwise nothing will work properly.
        Throws:
        SecurityLevelException
        InvalidDlogGroupException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        CheatAttemptException

    • Method Detail

      • receiveCommitment

        public CmtRCommitPhaseOutput receiveCommitment()
                                        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        Runs the commit phase of the commitment scheme.

        Pseudo code:

        "WAIT for a value c

        STORE c".

        Specified by:
        receiveCommitment in interface CmtReceiver
        Returns:
        the output of the commit phase.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem during serialization mechanism.
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem during communication phase

      • receiveDecommitment

        public CmtCommitValue receiveDecommitment(long id)
                                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                          java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Runs the decommit phase of the commitment scheme.

        Pseudo code:

        "WAIT for (r, x) from C

        Let c = (h,u,v); if not of this format, output REJ

        IF NOT

        u=g^r

        v = h^r * x

        x in G

        OUTPUT REJ

        ELSE

        OUTPUT ACC and value x"

        Specified by:
        receiveDecommitment in interface CmtReceiver
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        the committed value if the decommit succeeded; null, otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem during serialization mechanism.
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem during communication phase
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getPreProcessedValues

        public java.lang.Object[] getPreProcessedValues()
        Description copied from interface: CmtReceiver
        Return the values used during the pre-process phase (usually upon construction). Since these values vary between the different implementations this function returns a general array of Objects.
        Specified by:
        getPreProcessedValues in interface CmtReceiver
        Returns:
        a general array of Objects

      • getCommitmentPhaseValues

        public CmtElGamalCommitmentMessage getCommitmentPhaseValues(long id)

        Return the intermediate values used during the commitment phase.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
